properties.name: csap.baseContext
properties.description: Base url for all csap urls. eg /csap/heath /csap/information, etc.

properties.name: csap.info
properties.description: Provides CSAP info integration

properties.name: csap.debug
properties.description: Enables debug of http requests

properties.name: csap.locator.enabled
properties.description: Provides client side service name resolution

properties.name: csap.locator.active-urls-locator
properties.description: Lookup url for retrieving endpoint urls. refresh is from ehcache.xml

properties.name: csap.locator.low-resources-url-locator
properties.description: Lookup url for retrieving endpoint urls. refresh is from ehcache.xml

properties.name: csap.locator.low-resource
properties.description: Resource type for selection. lowLoad, lowCpu,...

properties.name: csap.documentation.enabled
properties.description: Provides CSAP Api Navigator based on annotations

properties.name: csap.performance.enabled
properties.description: Provides JavaSimon Integration, including console

properties.name: csap.performance.monitor-urls
properties.description: Url patterns to  be timed and tracked

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.debug
properties.description: By default success reports will not be output in logs. Set to true to enable.

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.notify.frequency
properties.description: Frequency of email notifications

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.notify.time-unit
properties.description: hours or minutes

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.notify.addresses
properties.description: email addresses comma separated

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.notify.email-host
properties.description: Host to send email

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.notify.email-time-out-ms
properties.description: Timeout to send email

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.notify.max-backlog
properties.description: maximum number of items to store in memory

properties.name: csap.performance.alert.limits
properties.description: Java Simon counters and stopwatches specified by id will be validated against specified values

properties.name: csap.security.enabled
properties.description: Spring Security is enabled using either LDAP or file based security

properties.name: csap.security.ldap-enabled
properties.description: Provides active directory integration

properties.name: csap.security.rest-api-filter.enabled
properties.description: Provides http access control

properties.name: csap.security.rest-api-filter.urls
properties.description: Servlet filter patterns

properties.name: csap.security.rest-api-filter.group
properties.description: LDAP group. $CSAP_ADMIN_GROUP will be replaced with group in csapSecurity.properties

properties.name: csap.security.rest-api-filter.cache-seconds
properties.description: Time between re-athentication

properties.name: csap.web-server.enabled
properties.description: Adds tomcat AJP listener for integration with Apache load balancer

properties.name: csap.web-server.ajp-secret
properties.description: Adds tomcat AJP secret to be required

properties.name: csap.web-server.max-connections-ajp
properties.description: Throttles sevlet connections to both ajp  connectors

properties.name: csap.web-server.max-connections-http
properties.description: Throttles sevlet connections to both  http connectors

properties.name: csap.web-server.backlog
properties.description: Throttles sevlet connections to both ajp and http connectors, limits the queued requests

properties.name: csap.web-server.ajp-secure
properties.description: Forces ajp to be configured in secure mode

properties.name: csap.web-server.ajp-scheme
properties.description: http or https

properties.name: csap.web-server.ajp-proxy-port
properties.description: port for proxy

properties.name: csap.web-server.ajp-redirect-port
properties.description: port for redirect

properties.name: csap.encryptable-properties.enabled
properties.description: Supports loading of both normal encrypted properties files with filenames specified in application.yml

properties.name: csap.encryptable-properties.token
properties.description: The seed used for encoding/decoding

properties.name: csap.encryptable-properties.algorithm
properties.description: The algorithm used for encoding/decoding; it is typically autoconfigured by CSAP. By default it uses JDK Strong encryption. On desktop, either install JCE on desktop or set to PBEWITHMD5ANDDES

properties.name: csap.encryptable-properties.property-files
properties.description: File names on classpath contain properties that will be injected into Spring Beans
